name: Team Lead (Java)
description:
Responsibilities:

  • Define, design and implement projects and relevant architecture;
  • Develop and enhance functionalities that will empower core business;
  • Plan and estimate the technical tasks of the team, with different sponsors;
  • Participate in the selection and hiring of Software Engineers;
  • Be ready to urgently fix and deploy your own code or help others team, to find root cause of problems;
  • Be ready to business trips;
  • Ensure and guarantee the operation of the platform 24x7 with an uptime above 99.9%;
  • Analysis business data and continuously follow up business effect via report;
  • Build up products related with user growth/user jouney of online ecommerce(Awareness/Acquisition/Activation/Retention/Revenue/Referral);
  • Be collaborative and working with cross country team for project development.

Job requirements:

  • 5 years of professional experience as Senior Software Engineer;
  • 2 years experience at least as TL/Architecture;
  • Excellent Java programming skills and be familiar with SOLID principles;
  • Strong knowledge of IO, multithreading, data structures and algorithms;
  • Strong knowledge of JVM, Tomcat and Linux (Desirable);
  • Experience in building high-load, secure web applications;
  • Proficiency of the HTTP/REST/JSON-RPC protocols, microservice architecture;
  • Knowledge of Git (We use FeatureBranches/Gitflow);
  • Basic Unix command line skills are a must;
  • Experience with the following technologies (Desirable):Spring boot,Spring mvc,MyBatis, Spring Framework, PostgreSQL;
  • Passion for Software Development;
  • Highly Analytical;
  • Tolerance with code written by others;
  • Be sensitive to data utilization and security;
  • Owner, responsible, and highly committed to the projects;
  • Team player/open- minded/lively character/strong team spirit;

What we offer:

  • Work for one of world's biggest IT companies in Russia;
  • Comfortable office in Moscow City with limitless fruits and coffee;
  • Competitive salary with performance-based bonuses;
  • Mac or Windows laptop of your choice;
  • Corporate medical insurance.
